articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: BOJ to end negative rates, marking 1st hike in 17 years - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Japan central bank moves toward normalizing policy amid rising wages
articles.content: TOKYO -- The Bank of Japan is expected to end its negative interest rates when its policy board meets on Monday and Tuesday, Nikkei has learned, marking the first rate hike since February 2007 in a t… [+321 chars]
